channel.title: About on Vivek Nallur
channel.description: Recent content in About on Vivek Nallur

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m Vivek Nallur, itinerant academic, wannabe go-player and an enthusiastic traveller. I love asking questions, and then launching on a search for answers to those questions. Hence, my career as a researcher came, more or less, naturally to me. And I’ve already lied to you at least twice, in this paragraph!

Research

I work as a Research Fellow with the Distributed Systems Group in the School of Computer Science & Statistics at Trinity College Dublin.

Current Project

I work on an EU project called Diversify which aims at using ‘Diversity’ as a foundational principle in making better collaborative adaptive systems. My main interest is in self-adaptive systems, engineering them, predicting/controlling their various properties, getting them to collaborate, and preventing/boosting emergent effects.
